data.process: Phone to arrange an appointment. Drop-in appointments also available: Bethnal Green drop-in 1-5 Mon, Wed and Fri (opens at 11am (first come, first served basis)
data.clients: Undocumented migrants, asylum seekers, vulnerable adults
data.services: Drop-in GP clinic, with also offers information, support and advocacy to help people access health services
data.day: Mon-Fri (check website for specific walk-in/ appointment times)
